comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Helen (b. 1902) and Dorothy Gould (b. 1904); by the time this photo was taken, their parents were divorced, and their father had married his second wife: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Jay_Gould As had their mother: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Margaret_Kelly Dorothy May Gould Burns (1904-1969) married a Swiss baron, Roland Graffenreid de Villars, in 1925; they had two daughters before they divorced in 1936; in 1944, she married Archibald Burns as her second husband. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dorothy_Gould_Burns Helen Marguerite Gould (1902-?) also married a Swiss baron, Jean de Montenach, in 1923. The girls with their mother, elsewhere in the Bain uploads: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2449479844/] And here: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2448656237/]

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca,

Thank you for the girls' first names. We will add those to the record.
